name: fivethirtyeight_nba-draft-2015
title: NBA Draft 2015
description:
**See Readme for more details.**
 This repository contains a selection of the data -- and the data-processing scripts -- behind the articles, graphics and interactives at FiveThirtyEight.

 We hope you'll use it to check our work and to create stories and visualizations of your own. The data is available under the [Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/) and the code is available under the [MIT License](http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT). If you do find it useful, please let us know](andrei.scheinkman@fivethirtyeight.com).

**_Source:_** https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/data
